Title: Plastilinovaya vorona
Writer: Aleksandr Kushner (poem), Ovsey Driz (poem), Eduard Uspenskiy (poem), Aleksandr Tatarskiy (screenplay)
Actors: Leonid Bronevoy, Aleksandr Levenbuk, Lev Shimelov, Grigoriy Gladkov
Plot: "Plasticine Crow", a re-telling of the old Aesop fable about the Fox and the Crow.
